text: During the 2000–01 German football season, FC Energie Cottbus competed in the Bundesliga. ==Season summary== Cottbus finished 14th in the Bundesliga. ==Results== ===Bundesliga=== ==First-team squad== :Squad at end of seasonhttp://www.footballsquads.co.uk/ger/2000-2001/bundes/cottbus.htm ===Left club during season=== ==References== Category:FC Energie Cottbus seasons Category:German football clubs 2000–01 season
title: 2000–01 FC Energie Cottbus season
